title: Calories in a Whopper with Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in a Whopper with cheese from Burger King, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: Calories in a Whopper with Cheese
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper with cheese: flame-grilled beef patty, American cheese, sesame bun, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, ketchup, mayo; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations. Values based on standard U.S. Burger King data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A Whopper with cheese has about 740 kcal, 35 g protein, and 45 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 740 kcal for a standard Burger King Whopper with cheese.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: About 35 g of protein per burger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: Around 1420 mg, mostly from condiments and bun.

faqs.q: Does a Whopper with cheese have trans fats?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1 g, from the beef patty.

faqs.q: How do customizations affect calories in a Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: Removing cheese saves ~50 kcal; adding extras like bacon increases by ~100 kcal.
